meta-runner.name: UPack Pack
meta-runner.description: Run UPack Pack to create a ProGet Universal Feed package.

param.name: teamcity.tool.upack.source
param.spec: text description='Directory containing files to add to the package.' label='Source' validationMode='not_empty' display='normal'

param.name: teamcity.tool.upack.targetDirectory
param.spec: text description='Directory where the .upack file will be created. If not specified, the current working directory is used.' label='Target Directory' validationMode='any' display='normal'

param.name: teamcity.tool.upack.group
param.spec: text description='Package group.' label='Group' validationMode='not_empty' display='normal'

param.name: teamcity.tool.upack.name
param.spec: text description='Package name.' label='Package Name' validationMode='not_empty' display='normal'

param.name: teamcity.tool.upack.title
param.spec: text description='Package title. (optional)' label='Pacakge Title' validationMode='any' display='normal'

param.name: teamcity.tool.upack.description
param.spec: text description='Package description. (optional)' label='Package Description' validationMode='any' display='normal'

param.name: teamcity.tool.upack.version
param.spec: text description='Package semantic version.' label='Version' validationMode='not_empty' display='normal'

param.name: teamcity.tool.upack.icon
param.spec: text description='Icon absolute Url. (optional)' label='Icon URL' validationMode='any' display='normal'
